title: API Key
description: The OpenRouter API uses API keys for authentication. Visit your [API Keys](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) page to retrieve the API key you'll use in your requests.

title: Base URL
description: The base OpenAI-compatible endpoint to use. See the [Gemini documentation](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/openai) for more information.
